methods.name: JsonPath
methods.description: Get value of an object or array of a JSON. In this extension it is not necessary to start the path with '$.'. Exam: store.book[*].author

methods.name: JsonToXml
methods.description: Convert json string to xml string.

methods.name: Pretty
methods.description: Validate and show json in pretty print.

methods.name: SetValue
methods.description: Set value of an object or array of a JSON. In this extension it is not necessary to start the path with '$.'. Exam path: .book[2].author  value: Juan

methods.name: XmlToJson
methods.description: Convert xml string to json string.

name: KIO4_DecoJson
helpString: Set a path JSON and get value of a object or array. Info: https://github.com/json-path/JsonPath. Convert Json to Xml and Xml to Json. Juan Antonio Villalpando - KIO4.COM
